channel.title: Hackathon on SerresTech - The Technology community of Serres, Greece
channel.description: Recent content in Hackathon on SerresTech - The Technology community of Serres, Greece

item.title: Hackathon 2018
item.description: Hackathon 2018 announcement As every year SerresTech community is going to organize a 2 days Hackathon open to everyone. Last year 2017 Hackathon Serres 2.0 is also archived for reference A dedicated website for the 2018 hackathon has been created. Join it or share the news! Hackathon Serres No3 - 2018
